description: Delete a project revenue item quantity estimate.
permissions: Allowed for users who can delete the related project revenue item: admin users or manager members of the broker for the related project revenue item (delegated via ProjectRevenueItemQuantityEstimatePolicy -> ProjectRevenueItemPolicy).
side_effects: Deletes a project revenue item quantity estimate.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. --confirm is required and must be true.
